description:
The Hunters Guild works with the Vampire Control Division to track down the dangerous vampire, Tsujigiri Nagiri.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Le jour le plus long du Tueur aux Lames / Les chats sont mignons / Handa, jour de repos, histoire
The Longest Day of Tsujigiri Nagiri / Cats Are Cute / Handa, Day Off, History
Tsujigiri Nagiri no Ichiban Nagai Hi / Neko wa Kawaii / Handa Off no Hi History
辻斬りナギリのいちばん長い日 / 猫はかわいい / 半田・オフの日・ヒストリー
